extendedInfo.description: This is the best Skylanders figure reference app in the Android market. Just 10 new SWAP Force figures and a Lightcore Flashwing figure (with total of 208 figures/items, some of those figures' full set of pictures will be updated later). My Skylanders Collection is a must-have figure reference for the collectors and fans of the Skylanders games. This is the complete list of all the released figures. It helps you keep track of which figures you own, which ones are missing, and which ones you want! You can rank your favorite figures as well. **** FEATURES **** - Each figure has eight photographs taken from different angles. You can rotate each figure in two ways: by tapping on the right button to view the figure from each of the eight angles or by tapping on the left button to spin the figure automatically. - There are four different listings or views: the alphabetic one based on figures' names, the element one based on the element type of each figure, the rating one based on your rating for each figure, and the collection view. - The collection view indicates which figures you have so far, which ones are missing, and which ones are not released yet, all your owned figures are grouped together. A figure's name will be highlighted in magenta in the listings if you own the figure.  - When you are viewing any individual figure, you can go to the next or previous figure in the current listing by swiping left or right. Tap on the top right icon to display a group of console and power stats for the figure.   - This application works in both Android phones and tablets that support Android OS version 2.1-update1 (API Level 7) or later.  After you downloads app, no Internet or wireless connection is used or needed. All the contents are stored on the local device. You can use the app wherever you go, it always works!Update History: Version 2.2.9 (8/15/2013) - Added 10 new SWAP Force figures and a Lightcore Flashwing figure (to be released). Now we have total of 208 figures/items! - Redesigned the 'Series' list to add SWAP Force category and correct some 'Series 3' figures' categories. - Removed a duplicate of Double Trouble. - Correct some figures' Element error. - Updated several figures' photos.Version 2.2.8 (8/10/2013)- Added 7 new series 3 figures. Now we have total of 197 figures/items! - Updated several figures' photos.Version 2.2.7 (7/30/2013) - Added 21 new series 3 figures. Now we have total of 190 figures/items!	Version 2.2.6 (7/11/2013)- Updated Series 2 Drobot and Whirlwind (Solar) with high quality pictures.- Removed the rare and limited figures from series lists so the figures would not be duplicated in the Series view.Version 2.2.4-2.2.5 (6/28/2013) - Added a new view for listing figures by series, lightcore and rare-limited editions. - Added 2 white-flocked figures, Eruptor and Prism Break (place holders).- Fixed a minor bug that the spinning pictures doesn't work for some figures. - Made change so that the Nexsus 7 and Kindle Fire HD 7" look much better.- About contents have been moved to a view displayed via settings. 	Version 1.0.1 ReleaseDISCLAIM:SKYLANDERS IS A TRADEMARK OF ACTIVISION PUBLISHING INC. ACTIVISION, SPYRO ARE REGISTERED TRADEMARKS OF ACTIVISION PUBLISHING INC.CHAVA TECH LLC IS NOT AFFILIATED, CONNECTED, OR ASSOCIATED WITH ACITVISION PUBLISHING INC. THIS APPLICATION, MY SKYLANDERS COLLECTION, IS FOR SKYLANDERS GAME PLAYERS AND FIGURE COLLECTORS TO KEEP TRACK OF THEIR SKYLANDERS CHARACTERS. THE DEVELOPER, CHAVA TECH LLC, HAS TAKEN ALL THE PHOTOGRAPHS OF ALL THE ORIGINAL FIGURES BOUGHT BY CHAVA TECH LLC. CHAVA TECH LLC USES ONLY SO MUCH OF SKYLANDERS TRADEMARKS AS IS NECESSARY TO IDENTIFY THE APPLICATION AND SKYLANDERS FIGURES, THE USE FALLS INTO THE CATEGORY OF NOMINATIVE FAIR USE. NEITHER THE APPLICATION NOR THE DEVELOPER (CHAVA TECH LLC) IS ENGAGING, SELLING, OR TRADING SKYLANDERS FIGURES.Please direct any question to contact@chavatech.com

reviews.title: Like this
reviews.comment: Good app
reviews.author: Gus Haines

reviews.title: Great for collectors and parents alike
reviews.comment: Really like this app for keeping track of my collection! Would be good for parents who want to avoid getting duplicates
reviews.author: Helen Burnett

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I enjoy being able to keep track of my son\'s collection. It helps avoid duplicate figures. He really likes checking out the figures that he wants next. Please add the new sidekicks offered by the Frito-Lay promo.
reviews.author: Teri Tillman

reviews.title: Best figure tracking app I\'ve seen
reviews.comment: Excellent work! Easy to use, great clean look to the app, great sort modes to organize your collection and awesome psudo-3d views of the figurines.  There are definitely a few things that could be done to improve: * Would love to see \342\200\230sort by game/series\342\200\231 to separate SSA/SG/SSF figures. * Would like the ability to mark figures as \342\200\230Want\342\200\231, \342\200\230Don\342\200\231t want\342\200\231, \342\200\230Ordered\342\200\231 or \342\200\230Selling\342\200\231 (and then sort by those) * Would love the ability to hide \342\200\230chase\342\200\231 figures (i.e. the glowing/flocked/mono-colored figures that aren\342\200\231t different in game) from the lists.  Pro-tip: The favorites system is pretty flexible\342\200\246 I\342\200\231ve used it to categorize figures by series myself: Series 1 figures I own = 1 star, Series 1 figures I need = 2 stars, Giants figures I own = 3 stars, Giants figures I need = 4 stars, special variant figures I own = 5 stars and chase figures I never intend to find are unrated.  Despite my suggestions, it really is the best Skylanders app on the market by a fair margin. Definitely recommended.
reviews.author: Rhys Corlett

reviews.title: SIII
reviews.comment: Awesome app. Helped me find all the rare ones I was after. Bring on swap force :P
reviews.author: Allan Fuller

reviews.title: - awesome
reviews.comment: Helps knowing what my son has and doesn\'t.
reviews.author: G Bicer

reviews.title: Best app for android period!
reviews.comment: Saves the day when my son asks if he has this one or that one. I can pull the list up on my phone so dad isn\'t buying duplicates. Thank you for all the updates.
reviews.author: T M Tomlinson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this app it very helpful and helps Me keeps tracks of my skylanders keep the update coming
reviews.author: Michael Villafuerte

reviews.title: Well worth it
reviews.comment: No app compares to this 1 was worth every penny. Now I have a nice clean way to keep track of my kids Skylanders plus all the abilities in the new cool ones we haven\'t seen.
reviews.author: Amanda Keppers

reviews.title: Meh...
reviews.comment: Needs a want list. Also needs a refund option. So hopefully one of these two becomes available. Also - no disvlaimers about refunds either.  Definitely a buyer beware.
reviews.author: Puppy Jet

reviews.title: Great app!Love it!
reviews.comment: Helps me keep track of what\'s out there &what I need. I love how its starting to put series 3 characters up & they aren\'t even out yet! Has more pictures than other apps 2. Just need2add HiddenTreasure(PirateSeas). Just fyi; I don\'t know who else figured this out but the LightCore characters do work in spyros adventure as long as it isn\'t a new character.  Hex,prismbreak,eruptor,drobot work because they are series 2.Jet vac,chill,shroomboom,popfizz  won\'t because they are giants characters. :)
reviews.author: Angelic Angel

reviews.title: Best one out there.
reviews.comment: This is probably the best skylander tracking app out. I would love to see this stay on the cloud. My wife will sometimes call me just to see if I have a certain sky lander. But if this was on a cloud we both could modify and check our list.
reviews.author: Michael Rodriguez II

reviews.title: Amazing so far but..
reviews.comment: Great app.. But needs a drop box sync mode over multiple devices and backup of skylanders collection. I\'ve had to redo my collection three times now. Please add a backup or drop box sync.
reviews.author: Mike May

reviews.comment: Takes too much space...

reviews.title: Great App, but missing a character.
reviews.comment: This is a very solid way to keep track of your Skylanders collection.  Only loses one star because the Catapult is missing. Will re-rate to 5 stars if this is added!
reviews.author: Jamie McCracken

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app keep up with the updatea

reviews.comment: Great app but the bad Photoshop stone and employee figures let it down please put the old pics back

reviews.title: Great app

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: My whole family keeps track with this app we love it
